channel.title: Home on Markus' place on the web ☯
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Markus' place on the web ☯

item.title: Initial Commit
item.author: markus.pettersson1998@gmail.com (Markus Pettersson)
item.description: This marks the start of my very own personal blog. Finally. I intended to start this project way back when Google released .dev domains to the public. I managed to register a .dev domain containing my name for several years without doing anything fruitful with it. I even managed to talk a friend into buying such a domain for himself, with the promise that I would host his personal website for him.

item.title: About
item.author: markus.pettersson1998@gmail.com (Markus Pettersson)
item.description: Me Markus Pettersson, 23 y.o. software engineering student living in Gothenburg, Sweden. Born and raised in Arvika, where I grew fond of computers and tinkering with electronics. Because computers play games, and you could save a few sek by building your own computer. Very important for a child who likes to humble brag about graphics settings. It was not really until last year of upper secondary school that I encountered programming.

item.description: Find attached, my resume. And of course, the source{.tex, .txt, .git}
